meanings.definition: The action or process of adding something to something else.
meanings.sent1: The teacher made some additions to the lesson plan to make it more interesting.
meanings.sent2: She bought new furniture as additions to her living room.
meanings.sent3: The chef's unusual additions to the recipe turned out surprisingly delicious.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was like a warm addition to our group of friends.
meanings.sent5: The colorful additions to the garden made it a vibrant paradise.

meanings.definition: A thing added to something else.
meanings.sent1: The cake was delicious, but the chocolate frosting was the best addition.
meanings.sent2: The new wing of the museum was a beautiful addition to the building.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's playful antics were a delightful addition to our family.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a welcome addition to the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The extra toppings on the pizza were a tasty addition to the meal.
